You'll run out of events but spaces

For all your event needs

Timeless-classical-futuristic piece of art built in glass to capture all nuances of nature; giving our patrons an unparalleled dining experience.

One of the largest modern
conceptualized restaurants in the country; spread over 16000 Sq. ft. of space divided between 4 floors. Each level of Enigma offers a different culinary experience. All the levels are easily accessible by lift and
equipped with private  toilets for convenience.
